summary: Two single parents, one man and one woman, along with their kids, have to involuntarily share a house for their holidays.
cast: Nastassja Kinski|Timothy Dalton|Kevin Zegers|Cameron Finley|Billy Kay|Natalie Marston|Kelli Garner|Geoffrey Lower|Randolph Mantooth|George Murdock|Richard Tanner|Manny Fernandez|Frank Cavestani|Larry Robbins|Chez Starbuck|Oliver|Preston Ahearn|Pamela Bowen|Carlton Elizabeth|Letitia Fox|John Hostetter|Barbara Sharma|Maxine Stuart|Ralph Votrian|Jeff Yesko|Paul Vasquez
title: Juntos, pero no revueltos
